operations: At Criczap, we operate under a valid and legal licensing framework to ensure our services are compliant with local laws and regulations. responsibility: By using Criczap, you agree to comply with all applicable local laws and regulations concerning online betting and gaming. It is the responsibility of users to ensure that they are of legal age and permitted by local laws to participate in any betting or scoring activities.
fraudulent: We are committed to maintaining full compliance with all licensing requirements. At Criczap, we aim to provide a seamless experience for our users. However, due to the nature of our services (including cricket scoring and betting), we have specific guidelines regarding refunds. Please review the following refund terms carefully.
cricket games: Refunds may only be considered in cases of technical issues, such as transaction errors or duplicate payments. If you experience a billing error or if a payment is processed incorrectly, we may offer a refund for the overcharged amount. However, refunds will not be issued for lost bets or outcomes related to cricket games and betting.
our discretion: Once a bet or wager is placed, it is considered final, and no refunds will be provided for lost bets. Additionally, service fees, charges related to payment processing, and outcomes based on game scores are non-refundable. Any refunds for technical or billing issues will be processed at our discretion.
business days: If you believe you are eligible for a refund, please contact our customer support team. Provide your transaction details, including the date, time, and nature of the issue. Refund requests will be reviewed, and we will notify you of the decision within [X] business days.
